lead_paragraph: Chinese state media said three Japanese citizens who were accused last week of videotaping at a military installation were released, a gesture likely to be seen as a way to ease tensions between the two countries.
snippet: Chinese state media said three Japanese citizens who were accused last week of videotaping at a military installation were released, a gesture likely to be seen as a way to ease tensions between the two countries.

headline.print_headline: China Releases 3 of 4 Japanese Detained at Military Site

byline.contributor: Martin Fackler contributed reporting from Tokyo.
